name: Seemore Doolittle's Underwater Caper's
overview: The Amiga has several games creators, including Red Pill, Gamesmith, Backbone and Reality. This was made with Reality, and comes as a free editable set of files on a bonus disk with that software. The game was then shipped to CU Amiga as a full game, to demonstrate and advertise Reality. Its smooth and colourful, and not a bad freeware effort, although nothing special.
